channel.title: Suggestions
channel.description: Have a suggestion for the clan or problems with the website? Post it here.

item.title: caps and shirts
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
i'm looking for a company to make us caps and shirt with our team logo on.

it'll be around 20 $ each item (not confirm the price yet)
they need what we want for our logo and what do we want in the back of the shirt. Get to your photoshop and post your ideas .

item.title: Dev look here !
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
Dev, Qdt is organising a get together where we could have dinner and then go out or go in a lan place and frag. Look at this post, and tell me what you think.

http://qdt.6.forumer.com/viewtopic.php?p=197#197

item.title: Looking for a partner !!!
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
Anyone would like to go on igl 2v2 ladder with me ? See if we can make top 10?
Makes good experience and very challenging for me aswell so who want some ?

item.title: Redirect the ctf4 maps
item.author: invalid@example.com (ø° GoddaM)
item.dc:creator: ø° GoddaM
item.content:encoded:
Hey Taztg,

Did you redirect the ctf4 maps. I tried checking out one of the maps and it was downloading real slow you may want to check that to make sure they are all in the redirect. The map in question was Tutorial.... something like that, anyway just thought I'd let you know man.

item.title: Tryouts!!
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
Hey core Members. You're the one who take decisions in here but this is my suggestion, if we want great practice we'll have to have people showing up we are now 11 «BuA» Members ( i would of said active members but that would be a lie isn't it? ) and we have trouble to get 4 members for practice due to work school or whatever. I would suggest that we make a Day of tryout, see if we can have interesting members to add to our roster and get the practice that you guys decide to and get on...

Tryouts!!

item.title: Bua wildfire
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
i loved the map in 2k3. This could be a 2v2 map for 2k4 on our server. Anyone wants to make the transition for 2k4 ?

note: I saw it on our file page but it was for 2k3 so i thought it would be great to have it on for 2k4.

item.title: any unrealed users?
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
are you familiar with this ?




How to make Custom Flags
on your UT2003 or UT2004 server
Version 1.2 Updated 12/04/04

I have used the following key but you can basically name the files as you want.

Flaglogo.utx = .utx File containing flag logos A & B
FlagA = blue team logo
FlagB = red team logo
FlagA.BMP = raw logo
FlagB.BMP = raw logo

N.B* don't include the "" in the file edits, just the line inside them.

1. Flag Stuff

You need some knowledge of UTed....

any unrealed users?

item.title: Ladders
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded: hey guys with everyone on new puters, any chances joining back the ladders or this clan is completly on idle forever? I think we have the power to kick some serious ass. The core to decide but i'm for it !!

item.title: Mirc, irc, or the script
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded: hey guys you might want to change the welcome message. It's mentioned there our bfgn server ip. Just thought i let you know that !!!

item.title: Bot skill level.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Devastator)
item.dc:creator: Devastator
item.content:encoded: I think it would be a good Idea to increase the bot skill level to at least Masterful. That way, the bot could provide some sort of entertainment.

item.title: Scale of «BuA» website
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shattered_Steel)
item.dc:creator: Shattered_Steel
item.content:encoded:
OK, I can't take it anymore!

Having the website at a fixed scale isn't just annoying, it is also short sighted. How can we expect everyone to use the exact resolution the website is optimized for?

How hard would it be to have the website dynamically scaled? Make everyone happy with how the website looks.

item.title: Does anyone has the same page as me
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
here's a picture of what i see when i open the bua web page there's a big black box separating the menu under the circle with BuA in it

what causes this anyone knows?

item.title: FIX the Insert Field
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded: I know that the forums where updated recently and I am not sure that anyone else has noticed. The Insert URL actually says Insert Image.

item.title: Space
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Lurker_71)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Lurker_71
item.content:encoded:
To save space, why don't we go back and delete threads that are no longer useful... such as Scrim sign ups and Assassin call threads?

There's really no point in having them, once it's over with, and they clutter up the board.

Just a suggestion.

item.title: Fix the BUA LINK
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded: The BIG «BUA» at the top use to be linked to BuA's web page. The link needs to be fixed.

item.title: **«BuA» Suggestion Guidelines**
item.author: invalid@example.com (AX000)
item.dc:creator: AX000
item.content:encoded:
«BuA» Clan Members:
Use this sub-forum to make suggestions.
You should explain your suggestion and give reasons for it.
